title: [Large-Scale] Integrated Language Learning Strategy in the Era of Technological Change

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and general language learning experiences
context.additional_context: Project-centered design optimized for smartphone-based learning activities, promoting learner interaction and creative language use

learning_goals: Learners can effectively select and utilize digital tools (apps, platforms) for language learning using mobile devices.
Learners can analyze the impact of technological trends on language acquisition processes and provide real-life application examples.
Learners can complete digital storytelling projects incorporating peer assessment and feedback through collaborative learning platforms.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
